snippet: In the often mundane world of post-event news conferences, where coaches spew cliches and reporters worry about deadlines, Bobby Hebert's rant, in all its fan-like anger registered somewhere near the level of "bombshell."
abstract: In the often mundane world of post-event news conferences, where coaches spew cliches and reporters worry about deadlines, Bobby Hebert's rant, in all its fan-like anger registered somewhere near the level of "bombshell."

headline.main: In Postgame News Conference, Pushing the Boundaries
